name: IntelliQuiz
subtitle: AI-POWERED QUIZ MAKER APP
description: IntelliQuiz is designed for students who wish to streamline study sessions and instructors who want to simplify quiz creation for their classes. The app takes text from the user interface or PDF documents and uses AI to generate a quiz which can be attempted within the app or downloaded as a PDF file.

features.title: AI Quiz Generation
features.description: Generate questions based on your text input or text-based file.

features.title: Engaging Quiz UI
features.description: In-app user interface tracks your answers along the way.

features.title: Quiz Feedback
features.description: Understand your strengths and gaps in knowledge on any topic.

features.title: PDF File Generation
features.description: Take your quiz with you as a file with included answer key.
